newsitem.title: USA: ABT Building Q1 earnings boosted by sales.
newsitem.headline: ABT Building Q1 earnings boosted by sales.

text.p: ABT Building Products Corp said Tuesday double-digit sales gains for its hardboard products and a 16-percent increase in gross selling prices helped earnings in the first quarter ended March 31 climb to record levels.

The company reported record net income of $6.2 million or $0.53 a share compared to $5.5 million or $0.48 in the same period a year ago. Net sales rose to $77.0 million from $74.4 million last year, the company said.
Interior hardboard sales rose 11 percent, while exterior hardboard sales climbed 10 percent, ABT Building said.

The company also said its fiber cement plant in Roaring River, North Carolina, is scheduled to begin procduction in the third quarter and manufacturing at its vinyl distribution center in Holly Springs, Mississippi, will begin this year.
ABT Building Products makes specialty building products. Its shares were up one Tuesday at 23-1/2.
